sources.title: Ginger in the Morning (1974) Sissy Spacek Romantic Comedy - Directed by Gordon Wiles - 4K
sources.description:
Recently divorced ad exec Joe (50, midlife meltdown) begrudgingly gives hippie hitchhiker Ginger (20s, with opinions on coffee-induced wrinkles) a ride, sparking a journey where her free-spirited chaos collides with his grumpy romanticism‚Äîuntil his troublemaking pal Charlie and a bombshell secret force them to confront their generational baggage.

Available with original audio AND audio commentary by C.Cortney Joyner 
Go to settings ‚öôÔ∏è to change your audio options

Original title: Ginger in the Morning (1974) 
Directed by Gordon Wiles

Main cast:
Monte Markham : Joe
Sissy Spacek : Ginger
Mark Miller : Charlie
Susan Oliver : Sugar
Slim Pickens : Sheriff
David Doyle : Fred
Fred Ward : the truck driver

ü§î Can two people bridge a generational canyon? Or are they just delaying their own reckoning?

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: An attractive young hitchhiker named Ginger meets and and takes up with a lonely, middle-aged advertising executive who is recently divorced. He is inspired by her free-spirited independence while she is drawn to his old-fashioned romanticism.
metadata.Actors: Monte Markham, Susan Oliver, Mark Miller
